content: संकॢप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> To wish or long for. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To resolve, determine, settle. {@--2@} To intend, aim at, purpose; <ls>Ku. 3. 11.</ls> {@--3@} To arrange or connect together. {@--4@} To fix, assign, allot. {@--5@} To consecrate, dedicate. {@--6@} To imagine, fancy. {@--7@} To think about, ponder, reflect.
